phrases: He is shining even more brilliantly than before.
But there is a smudge that is getting in my way.
Someday, he will be strong enough to be rid of it.
This she will can only be broken by those who go on adventures.
I will leave this in your hands, Ottarl.
Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
Sorry, I did not mean to...
I had no idea you used a transformation spell.
So unless they know about this ability, no one can recognize me now.
If they do not see me for a while, they will probably think I died in the dungeon.
But are you okay with that?
As long as you know who I am, Bell-sama,
I took advantage of your kind heart and betrayed you.
If you just forgive me like this, I will...
So you are the supporter I have heard so much about.
Bell-kun told me all about you.
I will go make some tea downstairs.
Oh, but we only have two cups.
Oh, there is no need to worry about that!
You and I can use the same cup!
I guess even you tell jokes like that, Goddess.
Miss Supporter, can you swear you will never make the same mistake again?
To Bell-sama, to you, and more than anything, to myself.
I will never betray him again.
I will be honest, Miss Supporter.
You were lying to Bell-kun about so much,
and now you are trying to win him over.
I really do not like you.
What is with that glum look, anyway?
Let me guess: Bell-kun was too nice,
and refused to blame you at all,
so now you are being crushed by your guilt, right?
In my opinion, you are just being selfish.
I will judge you in Bell-kun's place.
Keep an eye on Bell-kun so he will not get scammed by any more weirdos.
Just so we are clear, this is not for your sake.
After this, I am sure of that if I do not do something,
Bell-kun will just get tricked by someone again!
And in the end, guilt is just the question
of whether you are capable of forgiving yourself or not.
If you have really changed, then prove it with your actions.
I will let you into the party.
And I am leaving you in charge of babysitting him.
So once more, hello there, Miss Supporter.
I hear you have been very good to my Bell-kun.
You have joined this race way too late.
So keep your hands off my Bell-kun!
Bell-sama is always nice to me, too!
I will rise to any challenge for Bell-sama, even a Goddess!
Yeah, I am not going to lose!
I need to go to Eina-san and meet the guild!
It is your fault Bell-kun ran off!
You were doing the exact same thing
It is rude to just run off like that.
I am sorry, but um... um...
Miss Wallenstein wants to talk to you, she says.
You were being attacked by orcs in the dungeon earlier, were not you?
This was lying on the ground after you left.
I wanted to give it back.
Then you are the one who saved me?
I have been wanting to apologize.
You were hurt because I let that minotaur escape.
It is not your fault at all, Wallenstein-san.
Actually, you are the person who saved my life.
Actually, I am the one who needs to apologize,
because I kept running instead of apologizing.
You are working hard at dungeon exploration, are not you?
It is amazing that you made it to the 10th floor so quickly.
but I have a long way to go.
I am no better than a beginner at fighting,
and I cannot get anywhere towards reaching my goal.
I am no good, and... um... um...
There is no one who can teach you how to fight?
What should I do for training?
I have been thinking ever since yesterday about what we should do, but...
Your weapon is a knife, is not it?
Do you use kicks or martial arts?
Um, I think we should go over...
No... it is not your fault.
Be sensitive to different things in the battle.
If you are, you will learn to fight whether you want to or not.
You are a coward, are not you?
I think it is important to be a coward in order to protect yourself.
But you are afraid of something besides that.
Keep an eye on everything around you.
Your skills and strategy are lacking.
This will not be enough to fulfill their orders.
Bell-sama, how deep shall we go today?
Oh, since we are taking tomorrow off,
I want to get as deep as we can.
Sorry to make you take a day off for me.
You need to find a place to stay, right?
And I have something to do, too.
Bell-sama, why have you been exhausted and beat-up even before
you go into the dungeon lately?
Keep an eye on everything around you.
Shall we run away for now and regroup?
If I keep being scared, I will never catch up to her!
I want to catch up to her, no matter what!
Why are you able to get so strong, so fast?
There is a person I want to catch up to,
and a place I want to reach, no matter what.
It is the same for me.
In a dungeon, you need to be able to fall asleep anywhere, at any time.
It is part of your training.
You are not going to sleep?
I-Is that the power of a first-rate adventurer?
A real man always goes after women in their sleep!
It is the height of impropriety to not do anything in this situation.
That girl is waiting expectantly for you to do something!
I did not raise you to be the kind of boy who goes after women in their sleep!
I will never let you kiss her!
This is a man's battle now!
Two fried potatoes with red bean cream.
It is a different one every time with you, damn it!
And now, at last, finally, of all people...
So you are saying it is just two more days, right?
It was only going to be until the Loki Familia's next expedition started.
If you try to pull anything with my Bell-kun,
You are not allowed to try and seduce him, got it?
You are not going to get your hands on my Bell-kun, okay?
I got to him first, after all!
Why am I being so bold?
You have a good goddess, do not you?
What the hell are you doing here?!
Argonaut Wanting To Be A Hero
